name: Earnest
description:
Earnest is a specialist agency on a mission to chase the humdrum out of B2B marketing. We don’t understand why B2B is so often treated like a poor relation to B2C. After all, business people are still people – they just happen to be at work. Since we opened for business in 2009, we’ve built brands, shaped strategies, produced content programmes, created experiences and developed campaigns that not only deliver results, but engage and delight their audiences too. It’s been so far so good.
We’ve built a talented team, picked up a surprising number of awards and are now fortunate to count the likes of Samsung, Vodafone and Instagram amongst our clients.
